slender.translation[0].definitions[0].de: thin in an attractive or graceful way
slender.translation[0].definitions[1].de: small or very limited in amount or size
slender.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The company only has a slender hope of survival.
The Republicans won the election by a slender majority.
We had to make the most of our rather slender resources.
slender.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Slender sounds rather literary. In everyday English, people usually say slim or thin:
I don’t know how she stays so slim.
